112002.title: November 2002 National Commission on NAEP 12th-Grade Assessment and Reporting established
112002.body: At Executive Director Roy Trubyâ€™s recommendation, the Governing Board established the National Commission on NAEP 12th-Grade Assessment and Reporting in 2002. The National Commission was charged with reviewing the 12th-grade assessment and developing recommendations to the Governing Board for improving it.
112002.more_details: Low participation rates by schools and students in 2002 had raised serious concerns about the viability of 12th-grade NAEP. An important consideration by the National Commission was whether NAEP should continue to assess students at the 12th-grade level.
